summary: A European family who plan on escaping to Australia, seem caught up in their daily routine, only troubled by minor incidents. However, behind their apparent calm and repetitive existence, they are actually planning something sinister.
cast: Birgit Doll|Dieter Berner|Leni Tanzer|Udo Samel|Silvia Fenz|Robert Dietl|Elisabeth Rath|Georges Kern|Georg Friedrich|Meat Loaf|Jennifer Rush
